org.elasticsearch.client

Interface IndicesAdminClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InternalGenericClient, InternalIndicesAdminClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndicesAdminClient, HttpIndicesAdminClient

    public interface IndicesAdminClient
extends InternalIndicesAdminClient
    Administrative actions/operations against indices.
    See Also:
    AdminClient#indices()
